00000000 00000000 //NOP
00000001 18010004 //ADDI $1, $0, 4
00000002 1C640000// LW $4, 0($3)
00000003 18840005// ADDI $4, $4,5
00000004 20640000 // SW $4, 0($3)
00000005 18630001 // ADDI $3, $3,1
00000006 18A50001 // ADDI $5, $5, 1
00000007 24250002// BEQ $1, $5, exit
00000008 28000002 // J 2
00000009 00000000
0000000a 00000000
